about_the_game:
It's About Time

Play as William Roger, a university student with a promising future. It's 1994, you awake after a terrible nightmare. You're late for school! With lack of sleep and nutrition, you "accidentally" activate the professors “Camera” and get sucked into the past.

Lost and alone in this strange place with your wits and no knowledge of where to go next, uncover the many mysteries of why you are here and at all costs, find your way back home before time runs out. 

THINGS SEEM A LITTLE ODD

Why does everything look a little off? Why are there weird artifacts scattered around? And why do I have so much sand in my shoe?

TIME IS OF THE ESSENCE

Up against the clock so to speak. The countdown on the Camera has started. Can you make the next jump before it's to late?

FIND YOUR INDEPENDENCE AND SO MUCH MORE!

After still living at home in your early 20's and having almost no independence, this little accidental trip of yours to the past is really going to test your limits. Gather more and more independence and discover your own self as well as love, friendship and loss as you venture forward through time.

OH NO! MY BOOK!

The pages from your trusty book, The Time Travelers Book of Questions (with no real answers), have been scattered around all of time. Probably a good idea to get that book back together and find the true answers you need.

IT'S T.E.A. TIME

Time Earth Agency wants to dominate and conquer time and space. Why does their leader look so familiar? There is only one person that can save the universe (that would be you, of course).

Featuring:

  • Custom stylized environments.

  • Original music and sound.

  • Hybrid style cutscenes.

  • Many references to your favorite movies and games from the past.

  • Made with love + passion.

  • Oh, yes, and a cool purple backpack.
    So grab that Brilliant Bubbly Backpack and fight your way through time and space. Hunt down the Time Earth Agency and it's maniacal leader, Prof. Stanley before you are history.

name: Time Jump

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 / AMD RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Above settings could change
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 / AMD Radeon RX 7800 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Above settings could change

short_description: Using a time travelling camera, adventure your way from the past, discovering your independence and uncovering the secrets of the Time Earth Agency and the Professor's plans to dominate time and space. Will you find your way back home before you are history?
